title: Strange overall behavior of Pixel 3a
content:
After restart my Pixel 3a behaves strangely.
The Quick Settings bar only displays one row of quick settings and when swiping down a second time, nothing happens (no extended quick settings menu appears.
Also I can no longer make the the apps quick access menu appear by swiping upwards from the bottom.
Also when I perform screen actions (eg typing) I hear a sound and feel a vibration (I turned this off).
Also I can't browse between open apps anymore.
It's like there has been some reset of the phone in some way.
Please let me know if this is an update issue and what I need to do. Thanks.
